pullRequest.title: Cleanup Known object table support in JITServer
pullRequest.bodyText:
Replace getIndex() and getIndexAt() with getOrCreateIndex() and getOrCreateIndexAt().
Add JITServer known object table information dump in KnownObjectTable::dumpTo() for the compilation logs.

Signed-off-by: Annabelle Huo Annabelle.Huo@ibm.com

beforeCommit.message:
Cleanup Known object table support in JITServer

Replace `getIndex()` and `getIndexAt()` with `getOrCreateIndex()`
and `getOrCreateIndexAt()`. Add JITServer known object table information
dump in `KnownObjectTable::dumpTo()` for the compilation logs.

Signed-off-by: Annabelle Huo <Annabelle.Huo@ibm.com>

afterCommit.message:

Signed-off-by: Annabelle Huo <Annabelle.Huo@ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: %d should be replaces with %u because `numOfEntries is unsigned.
